title: Help please
body:
so i went to play a lol game so i pick my champ wait to connect to the game does not load so close the game thinking that would help i load in still not working so i close it a then its say to reconnect so i click it then its saying reconnect again its been doing this for like 20mins so i gave up but tried one more time then i got in the game then when the game was done i got a leaverbuster for 5 games 

TY Riot :/

replies.body:
It's a known issue not on riots end, look at the board before posting and you will find out why.

Talk to optus support and the issue will be addressed faster 
https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/iu8pdy0q-for-optus-users
i just want the leaverbuster gone T_T
Yeah slim chance of it happening any time soon. OCE really needs it's own support page instead having to go through NA and being like a 17 hour difference time zone, it's fucked dude.
